Ensure that LAContext evaluatePolicy reply block success is checked (Swift)
Avoid using kSecAttrAccessibleAlways attribute when storing data in the Keychain (Swift)
Avoid using NSPredicate(format:) (Swift)
Avoid empty generic catch blocks (Swift)
Avoid hard-coded passwords (Swift)
Avoid using XMLDocument without restriction of XML External Entity Reference (XXE) (Swift)
Avoid using NSXMLParser without restriction of XML External Entity Reference (XXE) (Swift)
Avoid dynamic code injection in WKWebView (Swift)
Avoid Empty Finally Block When Calling Resource
Avoid empty catch blocks for methods with high fan-in
Review APIs returning sensitive data fields
Avoid using generic methods such as 'ToJson' or 'ToString' to save sensitive or PII data
Avoid data fields binded to columns to return sensitive data via APIs
Avoid filtering sensitive data using front-end
Review APIs not accessed by frontend functions
Always enable authorization checks at function level for functions called on by APIs based with Spring Application
Always avoid http redirects to unknown or untrusted URLs
Ensure that dynamically allocated memory on local pointer in functions/methods is freed.
Avoid use of unvalidated input in array indexing and memory allocation
Ensure exception objects are always caught by reference (C++)
Avoid throwing exceptions outside of main()
Ensure that there is at least one exception handler to catch-all otherwise unhandled exceptions in the main function(C++)
Handlers of a function-try-block implementation of a class constructor ordestructor shall not reference non-static members from this class or its bases.
Avoid delete operators to exit with an exception.
Avoid move constructor and move assignment operator to exit with an exception
Avoid checking Integer overflow without explicit cast
Ensure arrays and containers are accessed using unsigned values
Never use SQL queries with a cartesian product (SQL)
Never use SQL queries with a cartesian product on XXL Tables (SQL)
Avoid empty catch blocks (SQL)
Use WHEN OTHERS in exception management (SQL)
Never use WHEN OTHER THEN NULL
Avoid Procedures using an Insert, Update, Delete, Create Table or Select without including error management (SQL)
Avoid Stored Procedures not returning a status value (SQL)
Avoid SQL injection in dynamic SQL for Oracle
Siebel eScript: Avoid Functions without Try, Catch and Finally block
Siebel eScript: Avoid Functions destroying variables outside of the finally clause
Siebel eScript: Avoid Functions having Return statement in the Finally clause
Siebel eScript: Prefer using GotoView in the Finally clause of a Function
Siebel Scripting Review: Using Error Code in scripts
All new menu item must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
All new component interface must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
All new message channel must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
All new mobile page must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
All new process group must be into a permission list (PeopleSoft)
Avoid using hard-coded usernames (PeopleSoft)
Avoid string interpolations to prevent SQL injections (MyBatis/iBatis)
